p: 1-((1H-imidazol-1-yl)methyl)-2-phenylcyclopropane-1-carboxylic acid (47). Extractions with chloroform/isopropanol of the water phase allowed the isolation of the product as a light brown solid in 65% yield. 1H NMR (400 MHz, MeOD) δ 8.41 (s, 1H), 7.47 − 7.17 (m, 7H), 4.37 (d, J = 14.9 Hz, 1H), 4.06 (d, J = 14.9 Hz, 1H), 3.14 (dd, J = 10.0, 6.7 Hz, 1H), 1.96 (dd, J = 7.5, 5.4 Hz, 1H), 1.89 − 1.78 (m, 1H). 13 C NMR (101 MHz, MeOD) δ 175.4, 137.0, 135.9, 130.0, 129.9, 128.8, 123.5, 120.3, 50.5, 33.0, 31.0, 19.0. HRMS (ESI): calculated for C 14H 13O 2N 2 [M-H] 241.09715 found 241.09817.
